title: Shop the 15 Best Perfume Sales at Amazon Prime Big Deal Days
description: Editor favorites are up to 50 percent off.
excerpt: Editor favorites are up to 50 percent off.
text: You'd be wrong to think that Amazon Prime Big Deal Days only has perfume deals on suspicious designer dupes. Nowadays, the retailer's fragrance department includes popular brands like Viktor&Rolf, Mugler, Donna Karan, and Lancôme— and many of their top scents are included in the Prime Day sale happening today and tomorrow, October 8 and 9. To help you navigate the hundreds of October Prime Day perfume deals happening this week, we've created this shortlist of ELLE editor-loved scents that are currently on sale on Amazon. These are the fragrances editors wear ourselves, gift our loved ones, and recommend to the perfume fanatics in our inner circles.Snif Sweet Ash PerfumeNow 30% OffBillie Eilish Eau de ParfumOuai North Bondi Eau de ParfumSkylar Fall Cashmere Eau de ParfumNow 20% OffViktor&Rolf Flowerbomb Ruby Orchid Eau de ParfumScent Beauty Sweet Tooth by Sabrina Carpenter Cherry BabyNow 15% OffMugler Alien Eau de ParfumPhlur Fragrance Discovery KitNow 20% OffEllis Brooklyn Raven Eau De ParfumDonna Karan Cashmere Mist Eau de Toilette SetNow 25% OffLake & Skye 11 11 Eau de ParfumNow 20% OffSkylar Perfume Discovery Sampler SetNow 50% OffLe Monde Gourmand Pistachio Brûlée Eau de ParfumNow 20% OffLancôme La Vie Est Belle Eau de ParfumPhlur Vanilla Skin Hair & Body MistNow 20% OffAs the seasons change, so should your scent options. It's time to set aside your fruity summer favorites (for now) and transition to warmer, spicier scents like Ellis Brooklyn's Raven or Skylar's Fall Cashmere, both of which are 40 percent off on Amazon.Why not try a celebrity fragrance like Billie Eilish's amber gourmand eau de parfum or Sabrina Carpenter's new Cherry Baby fragrance for Scent Beauty? They're both under $40, so you've got nothing to lose. Or, maybe you finally grab a viral scent like Snif's Sweet Ash or Le Monde Gourmand's Pistachio Brûlée while it's marked down.The holidays will be here before you know it, and Prime Big Deal Days is the perfect opportunity to get a jumpstart on gift shopping. Internet-famous perfume brands like Phlur, Skylar and Ouai have perfume gift sets discounted as much as 50 percent during October Prime Day, so it's worth shopping early instead of waiting for Black Friday. But remember, Amazon Prime Big Deal Days end tomorrow at midnight, so these discounts will be gone in a flash. Sarah Maberry is a commerce writer for Hearst Magazines, where she covers fashion, beauty and pop culture. A seasoned trend forecaster and fashion historian, she analyzes viral products and trends on a deeper level. When she’s not writing for Cosmopolitan, ELLE, Harper’s BAZAAR, House Beautiful, Town & Country, Delish and other publications, she can be found roaming the Museum at FIT (her alma matter) or sewing her own couture while she binge-watches reality TV.
html:
You'd be wrong to think that Amazon Prime Big Deal Days only has perfume deals on suspicious designer dupes. Nowadays, the retailer's fragrance department includes popular brands like Viktor&Rolf, Mugler, Donna Karan, and Lancôme— and many of their top scents are included in the Prime Day sale happening today and tomorrow, October 8 and 9.

To help you navigate the hundreds of October Prime Day perfume deals happening this week, we've created this shortlist of ELLE editor-loved scents that are currently on sale on Amazon. These are the fragrances editors wear ourselves, gift our loved ones, and recommend to the perfume fanatics in our inner circles.

Snif Sweet Ash Perfume

Now 30% Off

Billie Eilish Eau de Parfum

Ouai North Bondi Eau de Parfum

Skylar Fall Cashmere Eau de Parfum

Now 20% Off

Viktor&Rolf Flowerbomb Ruby Orchid Eau de Parfum

Scent Beauty Sweet Tooth by Sabrina Carpenter Cherry Baby

Now 15% Off

Mugler Alien Eau de Parfum

Phlur Fragrance Discovery Kit

Now 20% Off

Ellis Brooklyn Raven Eau De Parfum

Donna Karan Cashmere Mist Eau de Toilette Set

Now 25% Off

Lake & Skye 11 11 Eau de Parfum

Now 20% Off

Skylar Perfume Discovery Sampler Set

Now 50% Off

Le Monde Gourmand Pistachio Brûlée Eau de Parfum

Now 20% Off

Lancôme La Vie Est Belle Eau de Parfum

Phlur Vanilla Skin Hair & Body Mist

Now 20% Off

As the seasons change, so should your scent options. It's time to set aside your fruity summer favorites (for now) and transition to warmer, spicier scents like Ellis Brooklyn's Raven or Skylar's Fall Cashmere, both of which are 40 percent off on Amazon.

Why not try a celebrity fragrance like Billie Eilish's amber gourmand eau de parfum or Sabrina Carpenter's new Cherry Baby fragrance for Scent Beauty? They're both under $40, so you've got nothing to lose. Or, maybe you finally grab a viral scent like Snif's Sweet Ash or Le Monde Gourmand's Pistachio Brûlée while it's marked down.

The holidays will be here before you know it, and Prime Big Deal Days is the perfect opportunity to get a jumpstart on gift shopping. Internet-famous perfume brands like Phlur, Skylar and Ouai have perfume gift sets discounted as much as 50 percent during October Prime Day, so it's worth shopping early instead of waiting for Black Friday.

But remember, Amazon Prime Big Deal Days end tomorrow at midnight, so these discounts will be gone in a flash.

Sarah Maberry is a commerce writer for Hearst Magazines, where she covers fashion, beauty and pop culture. A seasoned trend forecaster and fashion historian, she analyzes viral products and trends on a deeper level. When she’s not writing for Cosmopolitan, ELLE, Harper’s BAZAAR, House Beautiful, Town & Country, Delish and other publications, she can be found roaming the Museum at FIT (her alma matter) or sewing her own couture while she binge-watches reality TV.
